author: andyc
msg: It is a well-formedness error to reference an undeclared
parameter entity in a standalone document. Added check in
XMLEntityManager#startEntity(String) and also added a
method to allow the document scanner to set the standalone
flag once it has parsed the XMLDecl line.
I also removed dead code in entity manager that was only
needed previously because the error handling was in the
document scanner. Now that it has been moved to the
startEntity method in the entity manager, those methods
for querying information about entities is not needed.
Perhaps later we'll discover a use for them and re-add
the methods but for now we'll keep the code clean by not
having them.

author: lehors
msg: added parameter entity names a la %foo to the symbol table

author: ericye
msg: begin to add element content validation.

author: andyc
msg: Moved common entity handling code into the entity manager so that
the document scanner and dtd scanner don't have to worry about
entities not being declared; recursive entity references; etc.
Now the entity manager will report those types of errors.

author: andyc
msg: skipString bug fixed.
